attributes.action: Make nappies and sanitary products free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I do not believe it is fair that we are made to pay for these products as it is not our choice to have them we need to have them as a way of life,

Women do not choose to have a monthly cycle, therefore i think sanitary products should be free.

Babies can not use the toilet therefore they need nappies i also think these should be free.

I believe we should not be made to pay for things that we have no control over, we dont ask for these things to happen its a way of life, we should not be charged for something we can not control.
